00024 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00025 /// CTreeView::CTreeView
00026 ///
00027 /// @description    This is the default constructor which initializes member
00028 ///                 variables.
00029 /// @pre            None
00030 /// @post           Class variables are initialized.
00031 ///
00032 /// @param parent:  This is a pointer to the parent QWidget.
00033 ///
00034 /// @limitations    None
00035 ///
00036 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00037 CTreeView::CTreeView( QWidget *parent )
00038 : IGNATView( parent )
00039 {
00040     m_graphView = new CTreeGraphView( this );
00041     m_traceView = new CTreeTraceView( this );
00042     m_traceView->setGraphModel( m_graphView->getModel() );
00043     //m_traceView->hide();
00044 
00045     addWidget( m_graphView );
00046     addWidget( m_traceView );
00047 
00048     setChildrenCollapsible( false );
00049 
00050     QList<int> sizes;
00051     sizes.append(200);
00052     sizes.append(200);
00053 
00054     setSizes( sizes );
00055 
00056     connect( m_graphView, SIGNAL(quickEditOff()), this, SLOT(quickEditOff()));
00057 }

00074 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00075 /// CTreeView::connectGraphAction
00076 ///
00077 /// @description    This function connects the given action to the toggle
00078 ///                 buttons for showing or hiding the trace view.
00079 /// @pre            None
00080 /// @post           None
00081 ///
00082 /// @param action:  This is a pointer to the action to connect.
00083 ///
00084 /// @limitations    None
00085 ///
00086 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00087 void CTreeView::connectGraphAction( QAction *action )
00088 {
00089     action->setCheckable( true );
00090     m_graphView->setShown( action->isChecked() );
00091     connect( action, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), m_graphView, SLOT(setShown(bool)) );
00092 }
00093 
00094 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00095 /// CTreeView::connectTraceAction
00096 ///
00097 /// @description    This function connects the given action to the toggle
00098 ///                 buttons for showing or hiding the trace view.
00099 /// @pre            None
00100 /// @post           None
00101 ///
00102 /// @param action:  This is a pointer to the action to connect.
00103 ///
00104 /// @limitations    None
00105 ///
00106 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00107 void CTreeView::connectTraceAction( QAction *action )
00108 {
00109     action->setCheckable( true );
00110     m_traceView->setShown( action->isChecked() );
00111     connect( action, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), m_traceView, SLOT(setShown(bool)) );
00112 }

00114 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00115 /// CTreeView::loadFromFile
00116 ///
00117 /// @description     This function loads the data in the indicated file.
00118 /// @pre             None
00119 /// @post            The data stored in the indicated file is loaded, provided
00120 ///                  it is a valid file.
00121 ///
00122 /// @param fileName: This is a reference to a QString containing the filename
00123 ///                  to load data from.
00124 ///
00125 /// @limitations     None
00126 ///
00127 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00128 void CTreeView::loadFromFile( const QString &fileName )
00129 {
00130     m_graphView->loadFromFile( fileName );
00131     m_traceView->setGraphModel( m_graphView->getModel() );
00132 }
00133 
00134 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00135 /// CTreeView::quickEditOff
00136 ///
00137 /// @description  This function merely unchecks the quick edit button if
00138 ///               quick edit is turned off by deleting a node in the tree.
00139 /// @pre          None
00140 /// @post         None
00141 ///
00142 /// @limitations  None
00143 ///
00144 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00145 void CTreeView::quickEditOff()
00146 {
00147     m_quickEditAction->setChecked( false );
00148 }

00150 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00151 /// CTreeView::saveImage
00152 ///
00153 /// @description      This function saves an image of the tree to the indicated
00154 ///                   file.
00155 /// @pre              None
00156 /// @post             The current tree graph view is saved to the indicated
00157 ///                   image file, provided it is valid.
00158 ///
00159 /// @param fileName:  This is a reference to the QString containing the filename
00160 ///                   to save the tree graph image to.
00161 ///
00162 /// @limitations      None
00163 ///
00164 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00165 void CTreeView::saveImage( const QString &fileName )
00166 {
00167     m_graphView->saveImage( fileName );
00168 }
00169 
00170 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00171 /// CTreeView::saveToFile
00172 ///
00173 /// @description     This function saves the current data to the indicated file.
00174 /// @pre             None
00175 /// @post            The current data is saved to the indicated file, provided
00176 ///                  it is a valid file.
00177 ///
00178 /// @param fileName: This is a reference to a QString containing the filename
00179 ///                  to save the current data to.
00180 ///
00181 /// @limitations     None
00182 ///
00183 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00184 void CTreeView::saveToFile( const QString &fileName )
00185 {
00186     m_graphView->saveToFile( fileName );
00187     m_traceView->setGraphModel( m_graphView->getModel() );
00188 }

00190 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00191 /// CTreeView::setupToolBar
00192 ///
00193 /// @description  This function initializes the toolbar that is used for the
00194 ///               tree view.
00195 /// @pre          None
00196 /// @post         The tree view toolbar is initialized.
00197 ///
00198 /// @limitations  None
00199 ///
00200 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00201 void CTreeView::setupToolBar()
00202 {
00203     QAction *tempAction;
00204     QLabel *tempLabel;
00205     QToolButton *tempButton;
00206     // Create toolbar.
00207     m_toolBar = new QToolBar( "Puzzle View", this );
00208 
00209     // "Reorient View" button
00210     tempAction = m_toolBar->addAction( QIcon(":/orient.png"), "Reorient view" );
00211     connect( tempAction, SIGNAL(activated()), this, SLOT(switchOrientation()) );
00212 
00213     // "Show Graph" toggle button
00214     tempAction = m_toolBar->addAction( QIcon(":/graph.png"), "Show Graph" );
00215     tempAction->setCheckable( true );
00216     tempAction->setChecked( true );
00217     connect( tempAction, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), m_graphView,
00218              SLOT(setShown(bool)) );
00219 
00220     // "Show Trace" toggle button
00221     tempAction = m_toolBar->addAction(QIcon(":/trace.png"), "Show Trace" );
00222     tempAction->setCheckable( true );
00223     tempAction->setChecked( true );
00224     connect( tempAction, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), m_traceView,
00225              SLOT(setShown(bool)) );
00226 
00227     m_toolBar->addSeparator();
00228 
00229     // "Quick Edit Mode" toggle button
00230     m_quickEditAction = m_toolBar->addAction(QIcon(":/quickedit.png"),
00231                                       "Toggle Quick Edit Mode" );
00232     m_quickEditAction->setCheckable( true );
00233     m_quickEditAction->setChecked( false );
00234     connect( m_quickEditAction, SIGNAL(toggled(bool)), m_graphView,
00235              SLOT(setQuickEdit(bool)) );
00236 
00237     // "Generate Tree" button
00238     tempAction = m_toolBar->addAction(QIcon(":/graph.png"), "Generate Tree" );
00239     connect( tempAction, SIGNAL(activated()), m_graphView, SLOT(generateTree()) );
00240 
00241     // "Auto Name" button
00242     tempAction = m_toolBar->addAction(QIcon(":/autoname.png"), "Auto Name" );
00243     connect( tempAction, SIGNAL(activated()), m_graphView, SLOT(autoName()) );
00244 
00245     // "Auto Number" button
00246     tempAction = m_toolBar->addAction(QIcon(":/autonumber.png"), "Auto Number" );
00247     connect( tempAction, SIGNAL(activated()), m_graphView, SLOT(autoNumber()) );
00248 
00249     // "Auto Layout" button
00250     tempAction = m_toolBar->addAction(QIcon(":/autolayout.png"), "Auto Layout");
00251     connect( tempAction, SIGNAL(activated()), m_graphView, SLOT(autoLayout()) );
00252 
00253     m_toolBar->addSeparator();
00254 
00255     // "AI Config Menu" button
00256     m_toolBar->addWidget(m_traceView->getAIConfigButton());
00257 
00258     // AI Label
00259     tempLabel = m_traceView->getAILabel();
00260     m_toolBar->addWidget( tempLabel );
00261 
00262     // Depth spinbox
00263     tempLabel = new QLabel( m_toolBar );
00264     tempLabel->setTextFormat(Qt::AutoText);
00265     tempLabel->setText( "  Depth" );
00266     m_toolBar->addWidget( tempLabel );
00267     m_toolBar->addWidget( m_traceView->getDepthSelector() );
00268 
00269     // QS Depth spinbox
00270     tempLabel = new QLabel( m_toolBar );
00271     tempLabel->setText( "  QS Depth" );
00272     m_toolBar->addWidget( tempLabel );
00273     m_toolBar->addWidget( m_traceView->getQSDepthSelector() );
00274 
00275     // "Save Trace" button
00276     tempAction = m_toolBar->addAction(QIcon(":/latex.png"), "Save Trace");
00277     connect( tempAction, SIGNAL(activated()), m_traceView, SLOT(saveTrace()) );
00278 }

00280 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00281 /// CTreeView::switchOrientation
00282 ///
00283 /// @description  This function switches the orientation of the QSplitter from
00284 ///               horizontal to vertical and back again.
00285 /// @pre          None
00286 /// @post         The QSplitter orientation is toggled
00287 ///
00288 /// @limitations  None
00289 ///
00290 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00291 void CTreeView::switchOrientation()
00292 {
00293     if( orientation() == Qt::Vertical )
00294         setOrientation(Qt::Horizontal);
00295     else
00296         setOrientation(Qt::Vertical);
00297 }
00298 
00299 
00300 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00301 /// CTreeView::signalRepaint
00302 ///
00303 /// @description  This function tells the graph and trace views that they need
00304 ///               to redraw because a parameter has changed in the style tool
00305 ///               kit.
00306 ///               
00307 /// @pre          None
00308 /// @post         The graph and trace view are redrawn.
00309 ///
00310 /// @limitations  None
00311 ///
00312 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00313 void CTreeView::signalRepaint(void)
00314 {
00315  if(m_graphView) { m_graphView->signalRepaint(); }
00316  if(m_traceView) { m_traceView->signalRepaint(); }
00317 }
